title: Typerepublic: New Website
content:
Typerepublic font foundry proudly announces the releasing of its new website and invites you to visit it at: [http://www.typerepublic.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051317/http:/www.typerepublic.com/ "http://www.typerepublic.com")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typerepublicPicture-2_5857.jpg)

[Typerepublic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051317/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typerepublic) is a small independent type [foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051317/http:/typophile.com/wiki/foundry) based in Barcelona, Spain. It offers custom and retail typefaces with a local flavour (as far as the global world allows it) and high quality standards (according to technology).
author: ab

comments.content: Nicely done Andreu! Excited to introduce your work to a part of the design world that may not know you yet.
nice work. thanks for the link.
Nice work & a welcomed edition to the world of type on the web.
